channel.title: Auto Restarter Version 1
channel.description:
So this is one of my first programs I have worked pretty hard on it. [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2wpi8ee.png[/img]
It's a simplified tool.
Instructions: Put it in the same folder as your servers run.bat Insert the time you want your server to restart and press "Begin"
Features: [i]DNS Updating Custom Timer Stability[/i]
Please give me some suggestions on what I might be able to do to make it better on V2.
Download http://hotfile.com/dl/51437180/c8af81f/Auto_Restarter.exe.html

item.title: Auto Restarter Version 1
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

With this being an .exe file and the topic creator being a first time poster, be cautious while downloading and scan before using.

If you find a virus, please post it on this topic, and then report the topic/send me a message so we can take care of it.

hai: http://virusscan.jotti.org/en/scanresult/08acdf6b571cce9b20dee35c7ce1aa2db10c128c
Could be bullshit from that one scanner, but you never know.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Restarter Version 1

item.description:
@StrikeSarge wrote:

So this is one of my first programs I have worked pretty hard on it.

It’s a simplified tool.

Instructions:
Put it in the same folder as your servers run.bat
Insert the time you want your server to restart and press “Begin”

Features:
DNS Updating
Custom Timer
Stability

Please give me some suggestions on what I might be able to do to make it better on V2.
